review: It works ok. The Netflix app buffers alot making watching a movie not as pleasurable.
author: keitra crooks

review: Great product, easy to use.I have & use Chromecast, Wii and other items... Fire Stick is easy and now loaded with even more cool access to multiple products.
author: Ellis Blevins

review: I love my fire stick. It's super fast on my flat screen and I have not had any issues with it. I am super thrilled by the portability of the device. I have taken it on my travels and used it in many different devices.
author: Noel A. Cruz "Noel Ash"

review: Works great. Easy set up. Easy to navigate.
author: james worthy

review: it does not work at my residence.  It says the information is not available.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Opening the remote battery compartment was a real bitch. Very difficult. \ Back is too slick. Hard to unlatch. Otherwise seems to work great!
author: Billie D. Blansett

review: Great idea, needs more prime content to match ad hype.easy to use. Needs an off switch
author: Pen Name

review: The service can be bad at times but overall it keeps my 1 year old happy
